SIGNAL ram : ram_type := (
 0=> "0000011111000000",
 1=> "0000000000010011",
 2=> "0000001111000011",
 3=> "0000000000010100",
 4=> "0000001011011111",
 5=> "0000000000010010",
 6=> "1010001000000000",
 7=> "1000011111100011",
 8=> "0000000000010010",
 9=> "0000100011011111",
 10=> "0000000000010010",
 11=> "1010001000000000",
 12=> "1100100000000001",
 13=> "1010000000000011",
 14=> "1100000011110011",
 15=> "1111100000000000",
 16=> "0000000000000000",
 17=> "0000000000000111",
 18=> "0000000000000100",
 19=> "0000000000000101",
 20=> "0000000000000011",
 21=> "0000000000000110",
 22=> "0000000000000001",
 23=> "0000000000001000",
 24=> "0000000000000010"
);
